body:
They're 'hidden'. Provided by Identity as part of the framework. To get the pages into your project so that you can customise them:

  1. Right-Click Server Project
  2. Select Add > New Scaffold Item
  3. Select "Identity"

You'll then get a load of new assets loaded into your Server project. Look for:

Areas > Identity > Pages > Account > Login.cshtml

Customise away!
